data.name: Gamers Club
data.detailed_description:
We are the largest CS:GO club in the world. Our platform has the largest base of active players in Latin America and through it we connect and foster the scenario with content, training, championships, awards, broadcasts and announcements.

We work with a club where you can pay a monthly fee and have access to various features and benefits. Also, everyone playing at Gamers Club has guaranteed a 128 tick rate server to have fun with friends and make that good spray!

We do this because we are passionate about the eSports world and we want to develop the community to gain more and more space on the world stage.

data.short_description: We are the largest CS:GO club in the world. Our platform has the largest base of active players in Latin America and through it, we connect and foster the scenario with content, training, championships, awards, broadcasts, and announcements.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista SP2+
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750 +
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card must be 256 MB or more and should be a DirectX 9-compatible with support for Pixel Shader 3.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista SP2+
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750 +
  • Graphics: Video card must be 256 MB or more and should be a DirectX 9-compatible with support for Pixel Shader 3.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 MB available space

movies.name: O clube para quem joga sério
